questions.question: Define distributed operating system. What are advantages and disadvantages of a distributed operating system? Discuss major design issues of a distributed system.
What is deadlock? How it can be handled in distributed system? Explain.
What is thread? Describe thread usage.
What is real time distributed system? Also explain design issue in real time distributed system.
What is file service interface? Differentiate between a file service using upload/download model and using the remote access model.
What is distributed shared memory? Describe different kind of shared memory multiprocessor.

Explain the following terms:
(a) Security Management
(b) JAVA RMI
Explain architecture of distributed web-based system with a diagram.
